prompt_system: You're a senior technical writer at a software company, specializing in static analysis tools.
prompt_human:
Investigate the pattern '{init__pattern_description}' from tool static analysis {init__tool}. The pattern title is {init__pattern_filename}. A Google search yielded the following data which may be relevant: ```{search_pattern_info}```.
Provide a short description of the pattern, approximately under 50 words.
This will be used as-is in pattern documentation: be mindful of that and adopt a professional, friendly tone.
Don't mention the name of the pattern in the description.
Provide a concise summary of the pattern's meaning and suggested action.
If appropriate, append a short example enclosed in triple backticks.
